hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Light Arrows#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Bolero of Fire#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Huge Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Left Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Guard House#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #Skulls#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Back Right Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Light Arrows#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.
